msg: I can't believe it... I just lost everything I own in the casino.

replies.msg: Oh no; you must be absolutely devastated.

destination.msg: Are you nuts? I REGRET NOTHING!!! I had a great time gambling; my only regret is that I didn't get drunk while I still had some cash!

replies.msg: You sound surprisingly upbeat about this.

destination.msg: I'm here for a good time not for a long time, pal. If I can't make back my stash tonight I'll probably try my luck in one of the other worlds.
Each of these portals and terminals lead to different games. I suck as a gambler; maybe I'll try my luck as an asteroid miner.

replies.msg: What are you going to do now?

destination.msg: Keep having a good time, of course! Maybe I'll go to the bar and convince someone else to get me drunk. You should try that too; works more often than you'd expect.

replies.msg: I think you've had enough fun for one night.

destination.msg: No such thing, chumbo. The fun never ends when you live in the amusement automata. Maybe I should go pick some fights with random strangers.
